customer_reviews.title: So I purchased and installed this door and it looks and works great. If you are installing it yourself you will ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to correct the one reviewers comment on the size being one of 2 sizes. This is incorrect. This seemed very odd to me and was preventing me from considering this door, so I called Vigo directly and spoke with one of their technicians. He clarified that it will work on the entire range of sizes from 60 to 66 inches wide. So I purchased and installed this door and it looks and works great. If you are installing it yourself you will need help, the glass is super heavy and thick, but that us what I wanted, a glass door that was super sturdy and not some flimsy cheap thing. This is a fantastic shower door!!

customer_reviews.title: Attention to details 5 star
customer_reviews.text: 60-66" doesn't mean between 60 and 66 inches. It means either 60 inches or 66 inches depending if you use the narrow side piece that is 6 inches wide or if you dont use it. feature_bullets: TEMPERED GLASS STRONG: VIGO’s clear tempered glass is complemented by sleek 304 stainless steel hardware in this sleek pivot hinge shower door. Each specially designed pivot hinges allow for smooth door opening and closing, while a sleek L shaped reversible door handle makes this shower effortlessly chic.

SMARTADJUST TECHNOLOGY: VIGO’s shower doors were built to be adaptable. The reversible swinging door of the shower swings outwards and can be installed for either left or right opening. The reversible towel bar shower door handle can also be installed on either side. The doors allow for up to 3/8" of adjustability, canceling the effect of wall shift.

MATERIAL EXCELLENCE: The stainless-steel construction of the shower door hardware components guarantees that the door will not rust, chip or scratch. The brass door handle is mounted on pre-drilled glass, while full-length watertight clear shower door seal strips ensure the door remains leak-proof.

UTMOST STANDARDS OF EXCELLENCE VIGO shower doors abide by the following certifications: CPSC 16 CFR 1201 Category II, and ANSI Z97.1 affirming the quality of the glass to withstand weight and resistance to damage, respectively.

FLEX-SIZING TECHNOLOGY FOR EASY INSTALLATION: With shower installation assistance, setup is a breeze. This shower door set allows for 6"of built-in horizontal adjustability for your sizing needs, ensuring your VIGO product will continue to function properly as your walls contract over time.

LET’S GET TECHNICAL: The wall to wall opening for the 48” pivot glass door set is 42” – 48”. The door opening size is between 19 ½” – 25 ½”, while the overall door height is 72”. The thickness of the clear tempered glass is 3/8”.

LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY: All VIGO products boast a strong limited lifetime warranty on all finishes and structural related components, and a 1-year warranty on all shower seal strips for our shower doors and shower enclosures. Our US based product support team is happy to assist with any sales or product-oriented queries
